key_risks: Intense competition from CDN and cloud security providers leading to pricing pressures
Cybersecurity threats targeting Akamai, potentially damaging its reputation and customer trust
Regulatory risks related to data privacy laws and cybersecurity regulations
Dependence on internet growth and cloud adoption, which could slow down
Stock performance volatility reflecting market concerns about competition and macroeconomic trends
